word_mean: 切肢者：被切除一个或一个以上肢体的人

sentence.Network_en: Du Toit became the first female amputee to compete in the Olympics.
sentence.Network_cn: 杜托伊特成为了第一位奋战在奥运赛场的女子截肢运动员.

sentence.Network_en: Next was a deformed man - an amputee - and after him, a dog.
sentence.Network_cn: 接下来是个残废畸形的男人 — 截过肢 — 接下来, 一条狗.

sentence.Network_en: I am paralyzed here ! I am a fucking amputee!
sentence.Network_cn: 我是一个他妈的接受切断手术的人!

慕残者_百度百科 ... W:Wannabe， 自残者 A:amputee， 截肢者 P:Poliomyelitis， 儿麻.
Three American amputee war veterans have climbed to the top of Kilimanjaro in Tanzania ., 三名截肢的美国战场老兵登上了坦桑尼亚境内的乞力马扎罗山.
香港新闻从业者用语 ... 脑部手术 brain surgery 截肢的人 amputee 阉割 castrate.

list.abs: to understand what is happening , Dr Flor and her colleagues resorted once again to MRI , to record the brain activity of amputees while they were performing the mirror task .福罗博士和她的同事为了弄清原理，再次求助于磁共振技术来记录截肢病人在进行镜像治疗时的大脑活动。
This experiment simulated upper extremity amputee by restricting arms of normal person ., 通过对正常人的手臂进行限制约束 , 对上肢截肢者进行模拟实验.

entry.def: An amputee is someone who has had all or part of an arm or a leg amputated.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who has had a limb removed by amputation
